name: Consulting, Management, and Public Relations Services
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that provide counsel and assistance to the management
of private, nonprofit, and public organizations on a contract or fee
basis. Services provided may include strategic and organizational
planning financial planning and budgeting, the development of
marketing objectives, information systems planning, the
development of human resource policies, procedures planning, and
public relations services.
